alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 05 at 1:22PM MST until January 06 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...The Northern Black Hills, the Central Black Hills and the Southern Black Hills. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: A wind chill advisory means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Southern Black Hills
